SELECT m.time, SUM ( m.sum ) sum FROM ( SELECT CAST ( datepart( yy, begin_time ) AS VARCHAR ) AS TIME, COUNT ( * ) SUM FROM BIZ_INSPECT WHERE
water_management_office = #{waterManagementOffice} and
CONVERT ( VARCHAR ( 20 ), begin_time, 20 ) >= CONVERT ( VARCHAR ( 20 ), #{beginTime}, 20 ) AND CONVERT ( VARCHAR ( 20 ), begin_time, 20 ) <= CONVERT ( VARCHAR ( 20 ), #{deadTime}, 20 ) GROUP BY begin_time ) m GROUP BY m.time ORDER BY m.time
